extraDescription: Level 3 Business Transformation Architect to develop and deliver business cases, undertake and produce project related materials, and provide advisory services utilizing a project/data managements methodology on an "as and when required" basis.
comments: This contract includes one or more amendments.This contract was competitively sourced.For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.This contract is a multi-year contract.
